description: A quick and easy recipe for days that you do not feel like cooking. With fresh salmon and dill this is a delicious and healthy option.
ingredients: Salmon fillet|Extra Virgin Olive Oil|Garlic|Lemon|Fresh Dill|Salt|Black Pepper
instructions: Preheat oven to 400F. Season salmon with salt and pepper. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon. Bake for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
author: Chef James

description: A quick and easy pasta recipe with a creamy lemon garlic sauce. This pasta is light enough for a weeknight dinner but special enough for entertaining.
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. In a separate pan melt butter and saute garlic. Add cream and lemon juice. Toss with pasta and parmesan cheese.
author: Chef Maria

description: A light and fresh burrito bowl packed with summer vegetables. Perfect for meal prep or a quick lunch.
instructions: Cook rice and beans separately. Layer in bowls with fresh vegetables. Top with avocado and fresh lime juice.
author: Chef Rosa

recipe_title: Cucumber Sandwiches with Herb Cream Cheese
description: A classic tea time sandwich that is light and refreshing. Perfect for afternoon tea or parties.
instructions: Spread cream cheese mixed with fresh herbs on bread. Layer cucumber slices. Remove crusts and cut diagonally.
author: Chef Anne

recipe_title: The Best Crumbled Tofu Street Tacos
description: These tofu street tacos are packed with flavor and perfect for a quick lunch. Light enough for a weeknight dinner.
instructions: Crumble tofu and pan fry with spices. Warm tortillas and serve with fresh toppings.
author: Chef Diego

description: A tropical salsa bursting with sweet and spicy flavors. Perfect for summer barbecues.
instructions: Grill pineapple slices until caramelized. Cool and chop. Mix with other ingredients and chill before serving.
author: Chef Carlos

description: A delicious creamy green peas gravy. A classic North Indian curry.
instructions: Saute onions and garlic. Add tomato puree and spices. Add peas and cream. Simmer until cooked.
author: Chef Priya

description: Lovely finger food snacks with rice cheese and breadcrumbs. A real crowd pleaser.
instructions: Mix cooked rice with grated cheese. Form into balls. Coat with breadcrumbs and pan fry until golden.
author: Chef Sofia
